models.description: Qwen3 30B - Advanced model with 256K context window, superior Japanese→English translation, and excellent adult content handling. Perfect for complex RPG texts with long context requirements.
DeepSeek-R1 32B - Advanced reasoning model with superior context understanding for complex adult themes, character relationships, and RPG terminology consistency. No content filtering.
Qwen2.5 14B - Efficient mid-size model with excellent Japanese→English translation capabilities and good context understanding. Balanced performance for RPG text translation.
Gemma3 12B - Google's efficient model with strong multilingual capabilities and good translation quality. Fast processing with reliable Japanese→English translation.
